name: coi-verifcation
description: App for creating, mananging and confirming COI agreements between multiple parties

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:client
scripts.clean:server: cd server && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist
scripts.clean:client: cd client && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
